item.title: Zhipeng Zhao
item.description:
I have graduated from CMU and joined Microsoft. I recieved my PhD in ECE from CMU in 2021 advised by Prof. James Hoe. I also worked closely with Prof. Justine Sherry and Prof. Vyas Sekar.

Prior to joining CMU in 2015, I recieved my B.S. degree in 2012 and M.S. degree in 2014 both in Electrical Engineering from Beihang University, China.

Iâ€™m an FPGA enthusiast. I have built various FPGA-based systems in past years. In recent years, my research interests lie in the intersection of FPGA and networking.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
